page.title: 20A CHILDS VIEW
page.content: Netherhall school is the second biggest in the county of Cumbria.It has the best science,music and language blocks.It educates 1100 pupils and offers subjects ranging from cookery to computing. As a pupil I enjoy school.I take German and French as a form of language.These languages are optional in the 4th year.Ialso take science,home economics,geography,maths,english,art, and history.I enjoy history the most because reading about the Romans is interesting. Netherhall is full of nightlife.Classes are often held after school,such as clubs etc.The drama dept. always organize different kinds of dramas and productions. Netherhall on the whole is a very educatioal and enjoyable school.
